data.title: Larynx and Hypopharynx
data.meta_description: Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) and computed tomography (CT) are the imaging techniques of choice for examination of the larynx and hypopharynx. Since the pioneering research on vocal cord vibration using Doppler ultrasound conducted by MENSCH in 1964, several other...
